LanguageData.Prude.degreeDatas.0.label: prude
LanguageData.Prude.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME hates the sight of the human body. HECAP will be extremely unhappy when naked, more displeased than usual in tattered or worn-out clothing, and dislike the sight of other naked people.
LanguageData.Insomniac.degreeDatas.0.label: insomniac
LanguageData.Insomniac.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME will find it difficult to fall asleep because of HIS condition. HECAP will stay up longer and probably be tired a lot.
LanguageData.BleedingHeart.degreeDatas.0.label: bleeding heart
LanguageData.BleedingHeart.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has a big heart and gets very emotional. HECAP loves helping people, and abhors violence and injustice. HE is more affected by these things than others.
LanguageData.Gourmet.degreeDatas.0.label: gourmet
LanguageData.Gourmet.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is always a critic when it comes to food. HECAP expects to be fed well and will complain if HIS meals aren't up to par.
LanguageData.Unstable.degreeDatas.0.label: unstable
LanguageData.Unstable.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is more prone to random mood swings, which can be more severe than normal for others.
LanguageData.Lecher.degreeDatas.0.label: lecher
LanguageData.Lecher.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is unabashedly lecherous and a thoughtless heartbreaker. HECAP will hit on anyone HE desires with no regard for the consequences.
LanguageData.Codependent.degreeDatas.0.label: codependent
LanguageData.Codependent.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is romantically needy and won't be happy unless in a relationship. HECAP will be devastated by infidelity and breakups.
LanguageData.Outdoorsy.degreeDatas.0.label: outdoorsy
LanguageData.Outdoorsy.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME loves to be outside. HECAP gets a mood bonus when there is no roof over HIS head.
LanguageData.Pluviophile.degreeDatas.0.label: pluviophile
LanguageData.Pluviophile.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME likes the rain. HECAP gets a mood bonus when it's pouring outside, especially if HE gets to go out in it.
LanguageData.Photosensitive.degreeDatas.0.label: photosensitive
LanguageData.Photosensitive.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has eyes, either through gene modding or random mutation, that are extremely light-sensitive. HECAP finds bright light extremely painful and indoor lighting bothersome, and will be happiest in the dark.
LanguageData.Socialite.degreeDatas.0.label: socialite
LanguageData.Socialite.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME loves to party! HISCAP mere presence inspires more parties in the colony, because everyone enjoys partying with HIM.
LanguageData.Desensitized.degreeDatas.0.label: desensitized
LanguageData.Desensitized.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has seen enough violence and death that it no longer shocks HIM like it used to.
LanguageData.HeavySleeper.degreeDatas.0.label: heavy sleeper
LanguageData.HeavySleeper.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME sleeps like a rock, never bothered by adverse sleeping conditions, but is difficult to wake up.
LanguageData.Polygamous.degreeDatas.0.label: polyamorous
LanguageData.Polygamous.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME doesn't see any problem with having multiple partners. HECAP doesn't mind if HIS partner romances other people, but will not be happy in a monogamous relationship.
LanguageData.OpenMinded.degreeDatas.0.label: open-minded
LanguageData.OpenMinded.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME sees people for what they are on the inside, not the outside. HECAP doesn't judge others for their appearances.
